titleStmt.title: An epistle [s]ent to divers [pa]pistes in England prouing [th]e Pope to bee the beast in the [1]3 of the Reuelations, and to be the man exalted in the temple of God, as God, Thess. 2.2 ... / by F.K.
titleStmt.author: Kett, Francis, d. 1589.

notesStmt.note: Running title: A dehortation from papistry.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
